amendment.description: An amendment numbered 84 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new paragraph titled Effective Date, stating that the plan will take effect on the date the Secretary certifies that any increase in the percentage of Federal lands leased for oil and gas production would not perpetuate environmental injustice.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to add a new effective date stating that the plan will take effect on the date the Secretary certifies that any increase in the percentage of Federal lands leased for oil and gas production would not perpetuate environmental injustice.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A036) Failed by recorded vote: 207 - 223 (Roll no. 61).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A036) offered by Ms. Lee (CA).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A036) Failed by recorded vote: 207 - 223 (Roll no. 61).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
